_meta.author: Charley Scholz, ELEV8
_meta.coauthor: Claude 4.6 Opus, Claude Code (coding assistant), Cursor (IDE)
_meta.description: Art style presets for creative prompt engineering

presets.name: Photorealistic
presets.promptFragment: photorealistic, ultra-detailed, hyperrealistic rendering, indistinguishable from a photograph
presets.description: Indistinguishable from reality — extreme detail, accurate physics, and true-to-life rendering

presets.name: Oil Painting
presets.promptFragment: oil painting style, visible brush strokes, rich layered pigment, classical fine art rendering
presets.description: The timeless medium of the masters — visible impasto brushwork, rich pigment depth, and centuries of artistic tradition

presets.name: Watercolor
presets.promptFragment: watercolor painting, translucent washes, soft bleeding edges, visible paper texture, delicate pigment flow
presets.description: Translucent beauty — pigment flowing into wet paper, soft bleeding edges, and the elegant unpredictability of water

presets.name: Anime / Manga
presets.promptFragment: anime art style, cel-shaded, clean linework, expressive eyes, vibrant colors, Japanese animation aesthetic
presets.description: The bold visual language of Japanese animation — expressive characters, clean lines, and dynamic compositions

presets.name: Cyberpunk
presets.promptFragment: cyberpunk aesthetic, neon-lit urban dystopia, high tech low life, rain-slicked streets, holographic advertisements
presets.description: High tech, low life — neon-drenched megacities, rain-slicked streets, and the collision of advanced technology with human grit

presets.name: Art Deco
presets.promptFragment: Art Deco style, geometric patterns, gold and chrome accents, luxurious symmetry, 1920s glamour
presets.description: The glamour of the Roaring Twenties — bold geometry, metallic accents, and opulent symmetrical design

presets.name: Brutalist
presets.promptFragment: brutalist aesthetic, raw concrete, monolithic forms, stark geometric shapes, imposing monumental scale
presets.description: Unapologetic raw power — massive concrete forms, exposed materials, and an imposing monumentality that refuses to charm

presets.name: Impressionist
presets.promptFragment: Impressionist painting style, visible dappled brushwork, capturing light and moment, vibrant broken color
presets.description: Capturing the fleeting moment — dappled light, broken color, and the impression of a scene rather than its exact replica

presets.name: Surrealist
presets.promptFragment: Surrealist art style, impossible dreamscapes, melting forms, subconscious imagery, logic-defying juxtapositions
presets.description: The art of the subconscious — impossible imagery, melting forms, and the dreamlike logic of the inner mind made visible

presets.name: Minimalist
presets.promptFragment: minimalist style, clean simple composition, essential forms only, generous negative space, restrained palette
presets.description: Less is more — stripped to essential forms, generous white space, and the profound impact of deliberate simplicity

presets.name: Pop Art
presets.promptFragment: Pop Art style, bold flat colors, Ben-Day dots, comic book aesthetic, consumer culture iconography
presets.description: Bold, brash, and brilliantly commercial — mass culture elevated to fine art through flat colors and graphic repetition

presets.name: Gothic
presets.promptFragment: Gothic art style, dark ornate architecture, dramatic shadows, medieval grandeur, haunting beauty
presets.description: Dark grandeur — pointed arches, dramatic shadows, ornate detail, and a haunting beauty drawn from medieval cathedrals and romanticism

presets.name: Steampunk
presets.promptFragment: steampunk aesthetic, Victorian-era machinery, brass gears and copper pipes, steam-powered technology, retro-futurism
presets.description: Victorian ingenuity reimagined — brass gears, copper pipes, steam-powered contraptions, and the elegance of an alternate industrial age

presets.name: Vaporwave
presets.promptFragment: vaporwave aesthetic, retro 80s/90s nostalgia, pastel gradients, Greek statues, VHS glitch effects, neon grid
presets.description: Digital nostalgia distilled — pastel gradients, glitch artifacts, Greek busts, and the bittersweet beauty of obsolete technology

presets.name: Studio Ghibli
presets.promptFragment: Studio Ghibli style, lush hand-painted backgrounds, whimsical fantasy, warm natural palette, gentle wonder
presets.description: The warmth of Ghibli — lush hand-painted landscapes, gentle fantastical creatures, and a reverence for nature and childhood wonder

presets.name: Comic Book
presets.promptFragment: comic book art style, bold ink outlines, halftone shading, dynamic action panels, vivid flat colors
presets.description: Sequential art brought to life — bold ink lines, dynamic action poses, halftone dots, and the kinetic energy of the printed page
